header_text: You're cooking dinner for your family, and you accidentally drop a slippery plate. You start thinking about the future and worrying about being a burden to those around you. You take a moment to breathe deeply, and your anxiety lifts.

elements.Text: Taking time to breathe helps your anxiety...
